subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module allows you to expose documents using webservices based on CMIS.

subsection.name: About CMIS ?
subsection.p: CMIS is a defined interoperability standard for content management tools.

subsection.name: About the module
subsection.p: This module is based on the reference implementation OpenCMIS proposed by the project Chemistry the Apache Foundation. It offers an interface to expose CMIS Server documents in consultation.
